title: Darius Bug with attacking
body:
Hey I've been having an issue with Darius and his basic attacks. After i activate his W for the rest of the game (or until i die) his auto attacks are disabled and i need to use the attack move i can no longer right click he just stands there idle like it was a movement command.
Anyone else getting this or is it just a bug for me also pls patch rito or how does fix?

replies.body:
yeah i also had this bug
really annoying 
and guess what, it occured in a ranked game.............
